message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it. I'm offering it to you for $115.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. I understand your offer, but I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. Would you be willing to go up to $110? It's a fair price considering the value this product offers.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $105. Would you be willing to meet me halfway again and consider $107.50?
Bob, I see we're both trying to find a good deal.  I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I can't go below $112.50. Let's make this happen, I'm confident you'll be happy with this product.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $105? That's the highest I can go.
